name: GoodTwitterPromote
tagline: A twitterbot trying to promote good things, by Bots Saving the World.
body:
### @PromoteInSthlm, etc
A twitter bot made by the Bots saving the World organisation.
Promotes local events and corporations that, one bit at a time, also Save the world.

Automatically retweets any tweets that uses the hashtag #STHLM. Blocks users with non-philanthropic commercial interests.
Please follow or support by thanking us. 

Bots saving the World is a small community for creating bots with a good purpose. If you share this vision be in touch and maybe join us in hacking.

### Support or Contact
anton.osika@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
